member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas
member.summary: The main Windows Canvas API for drawing 2D graphics.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.DirectX
member.summary: DirectX types, used for interop with other components.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.DirectX.Direct3D11
member.summary: Direct3D11 types, used for interop with other components.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics
member.summary: Windows Runtime vector and matrix types. These are only used for data exchange, and do not include any methods for doing math with the values. For more complete functionality, see the System.Numerics namespace.
